mapper.select: SELECT EMP.EMP_CD,EMP.EMP_NM, EMP.REG_NB, EMP.GENDER, EMP.TECH_LV, EMP.YEAR, WORK.CLIENT FROM EMP JOIN WORK ON WORK.EMP_CD = EMP.EMP_CD;

SELECT EMP_CD, EMP_ID, KOR_NM, ENG_NM, CHA_NM, REG_NB, IMG_NM, IMG_PATH, BIRTH_DT, BIRTH_TP, GENDER, MATRIAL, YEAR, SAL_TP, DES_JOB, JOIN_TP, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, PHONE, EMAIL, TECHLV, DRINK FROM EMP WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP ( EMP_CD, EMP_ID, EMP_PW, KOR_NM, ENG_NM, CHA_NM, REG_NB, IMG_NM, IMG_PATH, BIRTH_DT, BIRTH_TP, GENDER, MARTIAL, YEAR, SAL_TP, DES_JOB, JOIN_TP, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, PHONE, EMAIL, TECH_LV, DRINK, INSERT_DT, MODIFY_DT ) VALUES ( #{empCd}, #{empId}, #{empPw}, #{korNm}, #{engNm}, #{chaNm}, #{regNb}, #{imgNm}, #{imgPath}, #{birthDt}, #{birthTp}, #{gender}, #{matrial}, #{year}, #{salTp}, #{desJob}, #{joinTp}, #{addr}, #{addrDtl}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{techLv}, #{drink}, #{insertDt}, #{modifyDt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP SET KOR_NM = #{korNm}, ENG_NM = #{engNm}, CHA_NM = #{chaNm}, REG_NB = #{regNb}, IMG_NM = #{imgNm}, IMG_PATH = #{imgPath}, BIRTH_DT = #{birthDt}, BIRTH_TP = #{birthTp}, GENDER = #{gender}, MARTIAL = #{matrial}, YEAR = #{year}, SAL_TP = #{salTp}, DES_JOB = #{desJob}, JOIN_TP = #{joinTp}, ADDR = #{addr}, ADDR_DTL = #{addrDtl}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, TECH_LV = #{techLv}, DRINK = #{drink}, MODIFY_DT = #{modifyDt} WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd}
